title: Hannas: Karanlıkta Saklanan
overview: Mert Turker, a young psychiatrist who has completed his medical education and expertise, is appointed to a hospital outside of a city in Anatolia. Mert Turker at an interesting point in terms of location, notices the various oddities of the patients, the patients and the working people. However, in the first days everything is going on in normal course.
